result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth O. Lowery was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Harboring/Aiding a Felon, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.47(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

miscConds.notes:
Pay court costs and Department of Corrections Supervision Fees. Court costs are paid in full.
------------------------------

No contact with the victim, Cole Farris. No contact with co-defendant, Terrance Kyles. No alcohol or illegal drug use. 
------------------------------

Attend assessments and counseling as recommended by Agent. Submit DNA Sample and pay surcharge.
------------------------------

timeConds.notes: with work release privileges to commence on or before February 20, 2015 @ 8:00 am. Court STAYS ALL BUT SIX (6) MONTHS of the conditional release jail time. Conditional release jail time may be served in Milwaukee County. Defendant may be released on electronic monitoring if deemed appropriate by the authorities. Court will allow Defendant to earn good time for community service work performed.

supervisions.notes: **AMENDED ON 01-29-2015 TO REDUCE the term of probation to one (1) year pursuant to memo from DOC, and by Order of the Court.**

miscConds.notes:
Pay court costs including mandatory DNA Surcharge pursuant to Sec.973.046(1r), Wis. Stats. Court costs are paid in full.
------------------------------

CASH COMPONENT AMENDED TO $5,000.00. ($5,000.00 OF CASH POSTED TO BE RETURNED TO PERSON WHO POSTED). Defendant will not possess any guns or other weapons. FARRIS OR MICHAEL A. KORMAN, OR THEIR RESIDENCES. NO CONTACT WITH THE UW-WHITEWATER CAMPUS. NO CONTACT WITH CO-ACTOR TERRANCE KYLES.
